Hai PankajSolanki


        Iam Mans from india i need to learn about
Junit. I got a doubt in it, when we run a Junit
program whether the the failures of test is shown
ovarall or the failures is shown one failure after
another. That take example compiler and Interpreter.
In compiler the errors are shown overall but in
Interpreter the error is executed line by line. at the
same whether the failure of test is shown one after
another or the failure is shown overall. When i write
junit program the two assert i written should fail
according to the test but when i run the program only
one failure is occured then when i correct that
failure and again run the program the second failure
occured, what i pretended to say is whether it shows
the failure overall in a single run or it shows the
failure line by line. I need your thought.

thank u

C.A.Mans

> I will try that. Maybe its the reason.
> Regards,
> 
> Pankaj
